game.title: The Lost City of Eldarado
game.objective: Find the legendary city of Eldarado and retrieve the Golden Chalice
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep within the jungle, filled with treasures beyond your wildest dreams. Your quest is to find this lost city and bring back the fabled Golden Chalice.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, increased reputation among adventurers

tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city
tasks.description: Speak to locals and gather information about the location of the lost city. Be cautious of rival treasure hunters.
tasks.location: Taverns and marketplaces in nearby towns

tasks.description: Break into the professor's office and steal an ancient map that supposedly leads to the lost city. Be careful not to get caught.
tasks.location: Professor Wystan's office, University of Archaeology

tasks.description: Use the map to navigate through the dense jungle and avoid deadly traps and creatures.

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost city
tasks.description: Search for a hidden entrance to the lost city. Be prepared to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles.
